titleStmt.title: The psalter of David with titles and collects according to the matter of each Psalme : whereunto is added Devotions for the help and assistance of all Christian people, in all occasions and necessities.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by NUC pre-1956 imprints to Taylor.
"Devotions for the help and assistance of all Christian people" has special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
